programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2139
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep979
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boys dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wangs which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are constantly fighting with each other on everything, and now they are competing to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the Super Star midwife Gong San to supervise their sons and nephews to make it happen

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: A Japanese family with lowly paid part-time jobs turns to shoplifting to make ends meet. After one shoplifting session, the father Osamu and his son come across a little girl in the cold. Osamus wife agrees to take her in after learning her hardships, and they seem to live happily together until an unforeseen incident reveals hidden secrets..

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her teams performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chans help.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her fathers death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late fathers hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: The Grandmaster of Kungfu
programme.desc: The Eight-Nation Alliance dare not invade Tianjin as it is the homeland of martial arts. To conquer the city, Japan sends its top martial arts master to open a new academy challenging all Chinese masters. Huo Yuan Jia rises to fight, leading the other masters to resist the Japanese and defend the country.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: Love isPyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugos enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugos enterprise be saved?

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the others mole.

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: I Fine Thank You Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kongs neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the sick people of Asia and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Come Drink With Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar Drunken Cat who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kongs entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Muis embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love

programme.title: New Tales Of The Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all

programme.title: Return Of The Dead
programme.desc: A long-awaited horror sequel after Enchanted Shadow, this is about three asylum inmates telling their stories. In story one, a husband and wife discover they should be careful what they wish for. A naked female ghost seeks revenge from her watery grave in story two, and a dead prostitute returns as a ghost in the last tale.

programme.title: One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: One of the great Kung-fu film characters is Beggar Su, a legendary Ching Dynasty figure who was also a member of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers. Little-known director Liu Shih-yu uses the best Kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer to tell a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure, as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liangs work, but essentially an image to him as well.

programme.title: The Spirit Of The Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Two Champions Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world but she is unable to choose between both men even as they face a deadly duel.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponents son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chans elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named The Fastest Sword but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Clans Of Intrigue
programme.desc: One day, when the heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, Gong from the Holy Water Palace accuses Chu of stealing the holy water and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove him innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Flag Of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.desc: Mr. Smith, the angriest, most hardboiled man in the world, finds himself entrusted to protect the most innocent thing of all--a newborn child. When Smith delivers the baby in the middle of a gunfight, he soon discovers that the infant is the target of a shadowy force that has sent a team of mysterious and endless assailants, led by Hertz, to erase all traces of the baby. Amid a hail of bullets and facing every conceivable permutation of gunfight, Smith teams up with a prostitute named DQ to solve the mystery as to why the baby's life is being threatened before this makeshift family all ends up on the wrong side of a bullet. Everyone wants the baby dead. The big question is why?

Then, a set of wrapped pallets heats up the competition, forcing everyone to fight to the finish for what could be nothing morethan hidden garbage. And later, the bidding explodes over a large mystery item. And when the dust settles, two lucky storage warriors unveil the most explosive treasure to date.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 2
programme.desc: Arch-enemies drop their guard to team up against a new threat. Then, it's back to the future when Desert Dan risks all on a tire and a hunch. And later, blades are drawn, fragile alliances crumble, and the buyers let nothing stand in the way of winning big.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 4
programme.desc: Michael convinces car wash patrons that he broke their window, only to miraculously fix it with the push of a button. Then, dry cleaning customers are confused when Michael is suddenly wearing their clothes in the blink of an eye. Plus, he has pet store shoppers convinced that they're seeing multiple fish in an empty water bowl.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 7
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys swipe food off other diners' plates at a buffet, tutor students in foreign languages they don't speak, and try to start a dance party in a public park.

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy The Kid McDonnen and Henry Razor Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they cant refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Friends S4 1
programme.desc: Ross dates Rachel again after unwittingly agreeing to take responsibility for their breakup. Phoebe reconciles with her mother. Monica is stung by a jellyfish.

programme.title: East New York S1 14
programme.desc: When a house party ends in murder, Morales, and Killian turn to Quinlan for help. Also, Haywood takes on an unexpected new role, and Suarez helps his brother.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 08
programme.desc: Our hosts find hacks for retrieving lost objects, separating egg yolks, and removing wallpaper stains. They'll also make duct tape an All-Star, find another use for walnuts, and show you how to hack your home while you're away.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 09
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin swim in the back of a truck, cook steak in a bag, and turn bike parts into a clock. Plus, they add coffee filters to the All-Star club, uncover road trip tips, and craft hacks to defend against your sick spouse.

programme.desc: In the seventh season premiere, the squad investigates a hip-hop record label when one of the artists and six bystanders are gunned down. Brenda becomes the target of a civil suit.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 10
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin uncover the difference between a hack and a wack, as they use an onion for cleaning and beer for moisturizer. Plus, they show you the real way to hack your hotel breakfast, and how to defend against your needy neighbor.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 01
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin return with an explosion of brand new hacks! Tonight, they cook lasagna in a dishwasher, go back in time to discover some of history's earliest hacks, and learn how to hack breakfast using power tools.

programme.title: East New York S1 15
programme.desc: When a body is found at the construction site of a new high-end housing development, the team races to find the killer amidst a contentious gentrification battle in the neighborhood.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 12
programme.desc: Sharon's ex, Jack (TOM BERENGER), is back again, defending a man who is attempting to withdraw a confession in the murder of his wife. Rusty interviews Slider (GARRETT COFFEY).

programme.title: The Closer S7 2
programme.desc: As the LAPD undergoes a major realignment, Brenda's team investigates the murder of a young girl who was house-sitting. Captain Raydor's forced to expand her audit of Major Crimes.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 3
programme.desc: Jesse knows you don't strike it rich if you play it safe, so he gambles big on a risky bin. Then, Lori defies her husband Brandon and buys a questionable unit. Will her bold move lead to a dynasty or divorce? And later, lightning erupts when the buyers battle it out for a puzzle of parts they hope will add up to one smooth ride.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 4
programme.desc: Big money brings out fierce competition at a rare high-stakes RV auction. Then, the contents of a locker spill out at our bidders' feet, smashing several dangerous objects. Will it bring seven years of bad luck, or a 7-figure payday? And later, Jesse's experience with antiques makes him think treasures lie behind the iron curtain.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 5
programme.desc: Michael convinces customers to buy toys that couldn't possibly exist, like bubbles that turn into Christmas ornaments when you catch them. Then, as a personal trainer, he makes a client think he actually sweat enough to fill a bucket. Plus, a security guard panics when Michael makes a car disappear on his watch.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 8
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys conduct a focus group with unique consumer questioning, are totally unfit as trainers in a gym class, and pretend to work at a famous New York bakery.

programme.title: Flipped
programme.desc: When Juli meets Bryce in the second grade, she knows it's true love. After spending six years trying to convince Bryce the same, she's ready to give up - until he starts to reconsider.

programme.desc: Northumberland - Kate walks a 15-mile stretch of St Oswald's Way in Northumberland. Her starting point is the picturesque village of Alnmouth, once a leading grain port in the 18th century.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Hidden Caribbean: Havana to Haiti S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Haiti - Before leaving Cuba, Joanna gets as close as possible to Guantanamo Bay, before taking a short boat trip to Haiti, a nation born from slave revolution with a strong tradition of voodoo.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Curry - Gregg Wallace explores the Nottinghamshire factory that produces 250,000 jars of curry sauce each day. Cherry Healey helps harvest chillies.

programme.title: Changing Planet S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Six presenters chart the fight to save the planet's endangered ecosystems. Gordon Buchanan returns to Brazil, Ella Al-Shamahi to Cambodia and Ade Adepitan to Kenya.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S5 Ep5
programme.desc: Piranha Killer - Cyril's after a huge Aymara. Weighing in at 100lb, this fierce ambush predator is capable of snapping piranhas in half or swallowing them whole.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Potato Waffles - Gregg Wallace, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman reveal the production processes behind Birds Eye Waffles. Gregg is at their factory in Lowestoft to follow raw product to packaged good.

programme.title: The Mating Game S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Freshwater: Timing Is Everything - Freshwater is often the stage on which millions of animals gather to find a mate. And the cycle of freshwater is the trigger for spectacular mating rituals and fierce competition.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Milan - Stanley visits Milan, the capital of Lombardy. He goes for aperitivo with a social media star and tries some of the Missoni family's favourite dishes: brasato, polenta and freshly foraged mushrooms.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Lost Worlds S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Scotland's Lost Worlds - Ben journeys from Stroma, inhabited 1,000 years ago, to Swona, its first inhabitants being the Vikings and then to the towering prehistoric cliffs of St Kilda, the most remote of Scotland's islands.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S10 Ep18
programme.desc: Fight the Freeze: Last Taste of Summer - Our Alaskans seize the final harvests of summer.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 - Brothers in Arms Ep2
programme.desc: The Nsefu lion pride welcomes seven new cubs during the wet season, when antelope and buffalo are spread far from the river, making them harder to hunt. Learn how the mother lionesses work to keep the boisterous cubs alive.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Living Together Ep5
programme.desc: A complex web of relationships rules all life on earth: all species are interconnected, none can survive in isolation. While some relationships are one-sided, others are mutually beneficial. From loose associations to tight-knit partnerships, everything has a place in natures great scheme. Complex interactions between species are not even limited to animals, and some of the best examples occur in the lush mountain forests of Africa.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Crocs and Hippos of Ndumo Ep6
programme.desc: The Nile crocodile and hippopotamus are two of Africas amphibious freshwater icons, found in waterways, rivers and lakes across the continent, including the stunning wilderness of Kwa-Zulu Natal in South Africa. These two species have co-existed for thousands of years, evolving in different ways to a life aquatic.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Winged Weirdos Ep2
programme.desc: One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - Amazon of the Seas Ep5
programme.desc: The Indonesian archipelago lies in the heart of the Coral Triangle, a region of the ocean recognized worldwide as the center of marine biodiversity. With the highest number of coral and fish species on earth, Indonesia has the richest reefs on the planet - but these reefs are under threat...

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Hluhluwe-Imfolozi Ep5
programme.desc: In the heart of Zululand, South Africa, lies the oldest game reserve on the African continent Hluhluwe-iMfolozi. Here, Southern white rhinos have found protection from people in times of turmoil. Hunted almost to extinction at the end of the 19th century, the parks establishment gave rhinos a lifeline breeding them back from extinction.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Rivers Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Wild East swims in the Rivers of Nova Scotia. Two species of fish, the Shad and the Gaspereau swim upstream to their ancestral spawning grounds, while a colony of Double-Crested Cormorants thrive on the mouth of the Pictou River.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2

These two species have co-existed for thousands of years, evolving in different ways to a life aquatic.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Ugly Ep3
programme.desc: Gawk at some of the worlds ugliest animals who owe their survival to the adaptations that made them so strange. A pudgy wolf eel, naked mole rat, and hideous sea lamprey may be superficially grotesque, but theyre evolutionarily amazing.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Skies Ep3
programme.desc: Take to the sky to soar with the Bald Eagle. From Cape Bretons Bras dOr Lake, to the birds overwintering home in the Annapolis Valley, the Eagles raise families, hunt and forage for food, and compete for territory with another bird of prey, the Osprey.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - Life in the Muck Ep6
programme.desc: The waters surrounding Indonesias sprawling archipelago are home to the worlds richest reefs and the highest marine biodiversity on earth. Within this undersea Amazon, a hidden ecosystem goes unnoticed. Buried beneath a seabed littered with trash, a community of strange and fascinating creatures thrives against all odds. It is a place where predators and prey run an evolutionary arms race and develop ever-more unlikely ways of attack and defense. On this mucky seabed, nothing is as it seems. It is a place where fish can walk and even change colors.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - And So it Begins Ep1
programme.desc: Head to the heart of Central Kalimantan, Borneo - home to one of the most unique schools in the world. There are 68 students in all, including class clown Valentino (who loves a short-cut) and class couple Darril and Liti (who have their first fight).

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 - Kings of Nsefu Ep3
programme.desc: Twin brothers with a powerful bond have ruled the Nsefu pride for three years. Theyre fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory. Witness the struggle that unfolds when rival males target their territory.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Living Together Ep5
programme.desc: A complex web of relationships rules all life on earth: all species are interconnected, none can survive in isolation. While some relationships are one-sided, others are mutually beneficial. From loose associations to tight-knit partnerships, everything has a place in natures great scheme. programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 - Kings of Nsefu Ep3
programme.desc: Twin brothers with a powerful bond have ruled the Nsefu pride for three years. Theyre fathers to all the young, and protectors of their territory. Witness the struggle that unfolds when rival males target their territory.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 - Life and Death in the Dunes Ep3
programme.desc: The Arabian Desert is one of the most challenging places on earth, but the animals here are resilient and specialized. Even for the hardiest inhabitants, deaths never far away. Creatures must seize every opportunity to find food, shelter and water. Adaptability is the key to dune survival.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 - Wonders of the Wadi Ep4
programme.desc: A wadi is a waterhole, a rare place in the desert where hard bedrock traps the tiniest traces of water. A vital valley visited by the creepy and bizarre. All animals must come here to drink, something predators are quick to exploit; venomous vipers, glowing scorpions and stalking tarantulas hide in the crevices, ever ready to strike.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Creepy Crawlers Ep4
programme.desc: Witness the tiny creatures that make us squirm while hiding admirable survival skills. From playing dead, removing a tail, or being able to lift objects 30 times their weight, these insects conquer the world with their amazing adaptations.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Tides Ep4
programme.desc: Follow the ebb and flow of the tides. Over a hundred thousand sandpipers migrating from the Arctic to South America make a pit stop along the Bay of Fundy. On the other side of Nova Scotia, the rocky-coastline provides a home for harbor and grey seals.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Maldives - Paradise Shrinking Ep7
programme.desc: The Maldives, a low-lying archipelago in the Indian Ocean, faces an uncertain future. Rising sea levels threaten to wipe out this tiny island nation. As the water rises, researchers are using nature to help keep the Maldives from disappearing. They are rebuilding the reef that protects the islands and may keep the Maldives from disappearing into the ocean.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Movin on Up Ep2
programme.desc: Best buds Valentino, Madara and Utris are ready for the next stage of forest school. Baby Clarita is at long last reunited with her mother. And toddler Mema discovers a tasty treat inside a rotten log (it can happen!).

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planets most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 - The Lost Prince Ep4
programme.desc: When Mizumus status drops during adolescence, his alpha female mother disowns him. Follow his challenging journey to find a new clan while overcoming the threats of charging hippos, hungry crocodiles, a pack of wild dogs, and a hyena-eating leopard.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 - Life and Death in the Dunes Ep3

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Predjama Ep3
programme.desc: Discover the world's largest castle carved into a cave. Predjama, in Slovenia, has provided protection not only for its Medieval human inhabitants, but also serves as a haven for the birds, boars, and mountain goats that live in the region.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Alhambra Ep4
programme.desc: Tour the marvelous Alhambra, a must-see fortress in Spain's Grenada region. Today this world heritage site acts as a refuge for the regions wildlife. With its many streams and fountains, Alhambra serves amphibian, fish, and bird alike.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Reinvention In Las Vegas - A California single mum searches for a home that's just right in Vegas after winning big on a scratcher.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Family Home With Aussie Flair - Dave and Jenny update a couples dull 80s rancher with some Aussie inspired touches. They give all the kids a special space of their own.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Snoop Dogg's Winning Gift - Snoop Dogg wants to recognise the impact the commissioner of his football league has had on the community's kids.

programme.title: House Hunters S189 Ep4
programme.desc: Investing In Flint - A couple loves the city of Flint, Michigan, and are eager to find a new home there. He wants a historic home downtown, while she prefers a ranch-style house.

programme.title: House Hunters S187 Ep5
programme.desc: Stay or Go in Indiana - After surviving a major health scare, a woman wants to live life to the fullest by upgrading to her dream home.

programme.title: House Hunters International: Where Are They Now? S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Revisiting Historic Renovations - House Hunters revisits memorable historic renovations in Italy and France.

programme.title: House Hunters: Where Are They Now? S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Czech Republic, California & New Jersey - A man who purchased a fixer-upper in the Czech Republic discovers how tough renovating in a former Communist country can be.

programme.title: House Hunters Renovation S12 Ep2
programme.desc: Big Reno For Little Brother - A big renovation gets even bigger when a new homeowner thinks outside the box. His older brother may have to step in to make sure he doesn't get too far over his head.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home S7 Ep3
programme.desc: Some Like It Hotter - David Bromstad helps newly minted New York millionaires retire peacefully in Punta Gorda, Florida.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Reinvention In Las Vegas - A California single mum searches for a home that's just right in Vegas after winning big on a scratcher.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Family Home With Aussie Flair - Dave and Jenny update a couples dull 80s rancher with some Aussie inspired touches. They give all the kids a special space of their own.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home S5 Ep2
programme.desc: Room To Move - With the addition of two young kids, a couples vintage Los Angeles bungalow is no longer functioning for them. Drew and Jonathan transform the homes choppy layout.

programme.title: Home Town Kickstart S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Boost For Buffalo - Jasmine Roth and Ty Pennington begin the small town kickstart movement in Buffalo, Wyoming, by revitalising the area's only movie theatre.

programme.title: House Hunters S189 Ep5
programme.desc: Making Memories On Palm Coast - A family searches for a vacation home in Palm Coast, Florida. He wants a condo with low maintenance, while she's looking for a bigger place.

programme.title: House Hunters S187 Ep6
programme.desc: New House Needed Now In Greenville - A family is living in a hotel as they search for a new home in Greenville, South Carolina.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home S7 Ep5
programme.desc: Fort Worth Fortune - A professional poker player and his family are looking for their ultimate dream home in Fort Worth, Texas.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home S7 Ep6
programme.desc: Winning Big In Florida - A couple who won big are ready to buy big in Cape Coral, Florida. They call on David Bromstad?s real estate expertise to help them find their dream home.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep22
programme.desc: The Case Of The Wonky Toys - All the toys in Toyland are visiting Fuse's workshop for a toy check but something is wrong! Toys are fine before the check and wonky after! Noddy investigates why toys are going wonky so that he can help them return to normal quickly. With the help of his wwwbook and following all the clues Noddy works out that Fuse has given himself a robot upgrade to help him do the toy checks quickly but he installed it incorrectly. That's why he's been making the toys go wonky! Noddy helps Fuse uninstall the upgrade and soon everyone is back to normal. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep22
programme.desc: Why Caterpillar Is Never In A Hurry - You see Caterpillar was never in a hurry. When all the animals were racing around Tinga Tinga getting ready for the Best-dressed parade, Caterpillar was happy to sit in a tree and munch on leaves saying Po-le, po-le, slowly, slowly, good things come to those who wait'. Then one day the rains come and Caterpillar disappears into a cocoon. What's happening?' questions Elephant. Wait and see' says Tortoise wisely Wait and See'. Then Caterpillar transforms into the most beautiful butterfly ever!... But who wins the Best-dressed parade? Tales from Africa

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep22
programme.desc: How The Hatch Was Won - Tin Top is feeling homesick so Big Chris tries to cheer him up. But who could that pesky varmint causing trouble on the track be?!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service mission accomplished!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep15
programme.desc: Lair - D-Structs kidnaps Revvit to show the crew who's boss when they compete over construction, so Ty plans the perfect heist to rescue their friend.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep15
programme.desc: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad - Chet is determined to open a giant can of tomato juice lands in town and Turbo worries that Chet is becoming obsessed with the can. // Turbo donates his race winnings an animal charity, but accidentally adopts a toad who moves into the clubhouse and becomes an obnoxious house guest.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep15
programme.desc: Tip's Deep Dish / Garbage Day - When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep56
programme.desc: The Healing Tree - While riding back to Miradero, the girls get lost -- and Abigail's horse gets bitten by a snake! Can an old friend's skills help save the day?

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep57
programme.desc: The Mystery of the Golden Unicorn - After finding a majestic horse in the wild, Lucky and the girls set out to solve the mystery of where she came from -- and where she truly belongs.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep30
programme.desc: 127 Owwws / 28 Fleas Later - Eep and Thunk become obsessed with a new trend known as quicktogramming/Grug accidentally causes the first outbreak of a super bug

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep31
programme.desc: To Squawk With Love / Lerk Was The Night - Eep & Thunk cheer up Squawk to avoid the first final exam/Eep and Lerk venture to the Garden of Eaten after the Broods spike the Watering Hole

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Novas toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep41
programme.desc: The Neverending Clover - After Clover is knocked unconscious, the entire kingdom plays along when she wakes up believing she's living in a make-believe storybook world

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Novas toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep41
programme.desc: The Neverending Clover - After Clover is knocked unconscious, the entire kingdom plays along when she wakes up believing she's living in a make-believe storybook world

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep29
programme.desc: The Hunted - Lotor seizes the opportunity and lures the Paladins to Thayserix, a mysterious gas planet

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep30
programme.desc: Hole In The Sky - After an emergency beacon draws Team Voltron to an ancient derelict Altean ship stuck in a temporal rift, the team is transported to an alternate universe.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep3
programme.desc: Stink of Fear: Chapter Three - When Bullwinkle remembers he forgot the secret ingredient to his stinky pie recipe, he and Rocky travel to Norway and enlist the help of his beloved Grandwinkle, not knowing that they are being followed!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep4
programme.desc: Stink of Fear: Chapter Four - Director Peachfuzz recruits Rocky and Bullwinkle to help her infiltrate Fearless Leaders hideout, and Boris and Natasha are replaced by a robot henchman

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep30
programme.desc: Climate Control / Ziryab - When Hobson gives Peabody and Sherman a weather-controlling device, they can't agree on a temperature and cause a massive storm flood in the Penthouse

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep31
programme.desc: Brain Switch / Koikawa Harumachi - When Peabody uses a brain-switching machine to let Sherman find out what it's like to be grown up, Sherman likes it so much he refuses to switch back

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep29
programme.desc: The Night Pig / Twigula - Kensington is terrorized by her overactive imagination when a possum comes into the yard and tangles with the Mighty Ones. / Berry mistakenly thinks that Twig is a juice sucker (like vampires for berries) and tries to convince him to make her into one too.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep30
programme.desc: Mystery! On the Yard Express / Lindsay Joins the Band - While passengers on board a fancy train, the Mighty Ones become a part of a classic whodunit. / With an impending visit from Brehts mother, Lindsay discovers she has more fun with her next door neighbors.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep15
programme.desc: A New York Minute - Odlulu is overwhelmed by the pace of NYC, so she uses the Slo-Mo Key to make the city move at a snail's pace. When the key's effects threaten a marathon, Waldo and Wenda are determined to get it back. The Wanderers must pursue Odlulu to save the marathon.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep12
programme.desc: Lucky And The Deadly Blizzard - When a sudden blizzard hits Miradero, Lucky and Maricela must work together to save the town.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep13
programme.desc: Unsolved Mystereep - When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep12
programme.desc: The Next Big Sting - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders rescue a wounded Speed Stinger and take it back to Dragon's Edge, unaware of the dangers that follow.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep12
programme.desc: Sacrifice at the Edge of Time - The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep12
programme.desc: Diapers Are The New Black - King Julien discovers diapers and brings style to his lemur subjects, igniting a fashion war.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep12
programme.desc: Goblin - Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep12
programme.desc: Venice the Menace - The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep12
programme.desc: Driven to Distraction / To Bee or Not To Bee - When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep12
programme.desc: Frank and Beans with Chili / Little Hound on the Prairie - Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tags ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep23
programme.desc: The Case Of The Tug Of War Rope - It's the annual Tug-of-War game in Daredale between the Pirates and the Ninjas. As the game starts the tug-of-war rope snaps. The game is cancelled until Noddy can find out who cut the rope. Using all his investigating skills and asking who, what, where, when, why and how questions Noddy follows all the clues. He discovers it was Scurvy who accidentally cut the rope. He was practicing for the tug of war game and didn't realise that his beak was so sharp! Now he can't take part in the game! Clever Noddy shows Scurvy how he can take still be a part of the game - by cheerleading! Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep23
programme.desc: Why Lion Roars - You see there was a time when Lion had lost his roar. Crocodile was snapping at all the animals in the Waterhole and Lion opened his big mouth but nothing came out! Tiny Flea tells Lion that if he dares to enter the Great Cave of Tinga Tinga then maybe he will find his roar. Lion plucks up courage and goes into the Great Cave. He roars with all his might, but a bigger roar comes back! Lion stands strong. He roars again and an even bigger roar comes back. Lion's very own Echo! He has found his roar! From that day on Lion always roars with pride, showing any beast who's the real King of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep23
programme.desc: Go Gadget James And Maxi - Maxi is jealous of all of James' gadgets, or more precisely, the attention the other cars give him. He persuades Molecom to devise some gadgets for him with hilarious results

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep24
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Animals - All the farm animals have run away from the farm and are causing chaos in Toy Green. Noddy launches his investigation and discovers that the farm gate was left open by mistake. Using his wwwbook and asking questions, Noddy follows all the clues and discovers that the Pockets left the farm gate open by mistake when they were playing with the animals. With the help of Bumpy, Revs and Big Ears, Noddy soon rounds up all the animals and returns them safely to the farm. And this time he makes sure the farm gate is shut properly! Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep24
programme.desc: Why Zebra Has Stripes - Zebra was once very easy to spot in Tinga Tinga as he was bright white all over. This very annoying as all he wanted was to be left alone to munch on yummy grass and get fat. One day, Eagle arrives at the Watering Hole with a new pair of sharp talons saying that she found them in the Great Cave. The animals excitedly rush to find something for themselves. Zebra accompanies Tortoise and the Monkeys into the Cave where they discover the last remaining item; a plain black coat. The Monkeys persuade Zebra to try it on. By holding in his stomach, Zebra manages to get the coat on but it is extremely tight and the black coat starts to rip. In fact, the more Zebra eats the more the coat rips until Zebra has a stripy black and white coat which he is extremely proud of. Not only that, his new stripes make him very difficult to spot amongst the tall grasses of the plains. Finally, Zebra can eat as much grass as he likes and not be spotted by the other animals!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep24
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor Or Bust - Mr Carburettor has commissioned a bust of himself for Silver Hatch. Disaster strikes when it is dropped, Big Chris tries to make amends, while Marsha distracts Mr Carburettor and the reporter

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or bucking bronco, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep16
programme.desc: Battering Ram - When parts go missing from the garage, Ace and Skya solve the mystery when they discover D-Structs has a new claw-tail which they put to the test.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep16
programme.desc: Buster Move / Gills! - Smoove Move is embarrassed when his nerdy brother comes to visit.// Skidmark causes a panic when he hunts a snail-eating goldfish at a fancy party.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep16
programme.desc: Very Foreign Exchange Student / Pig's Tail - Tip's new friend, the Roidian, stays with the Tuccis in hopes of learning from humans; Tip accidentally swaps bodies with Pig.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep60
programme.desc: Home Is Where The Herd Is - With academy life on the horizon, the PALs work together to tame wild yearling Governor before they leave. But maybe he's not meant to be broken.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep61
programme.desc: Festival of Festivals - Lucky doesn't want her friends to miss their favorite Miradero traditions while they're away at school. So why not celebrate them all in one day?

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep32
programme.desc: The Flawed Couple/ Go-Sip Girl - To learn about jobs, Grug assigns kids to the first shadowing/Ugga mistakenly creates the first gossip to impress the nitting club

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep33
programme.desc: Munk History / Happy Howl Day - Grug tries to solve the mystery of where Munk's family is /Eep refuses to join in when Ahhh! Valley celebrates their first holiday, Howl Day

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?
